name: Swipe-a-Mole
description:
This is a non-competing submission to COMO Game Jam IV. The theme was swipe.

In this virtual reality game, moles pop up in front of you - you grab them and toss them at various dangerous objects in your backyard. There is a scoring system based on which obstacle you've hit, but there is no time limit yet, but that is an intended design feature.

This is a prototype, so there is no menu and limited features... but the proof of concept is there.

Any and all feedback is welcome! Enjoy throwing rag-doll moles, friends!
